bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken"))).length == 0) {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18`, 1, 0.2, false));
    }
}
url1 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=2`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('排行', url1, 1, 0.2, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=4`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('新作', url2, 1, 0.2, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&mhcate=5`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('完结', url3, 1, 0.2, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=18&cateid=${kind[i].value}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].label, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36 EdgA/127.0.0.0",
    "Referer": Get('url'),
    "Authorization": cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "accessToken")) || '',
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "账号：", type: "text" },
  { name: "密码：", type: "password" },
  {
    name: "      💡登录账号💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "Login()"
  },
  {
    name: "      💡源站更新💡      ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   繁简转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: " ① 一耽 ❶ ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: " ② 一耽 ❷ ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: " ③ 一耽 ❸ ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: " ④ 一耽 ④ ", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: " ⑤ 一耽 ⑤ ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: " ⑥ 一耽 ⑥ ", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击评论排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "           最新评论           ", type: "button", action: "r(0)" },
  { name: "           最热评论           ", type: "button", action: "r(1)" },

  {
    name: "                   设置填写的页数为评论加载页数                   ",
    type: "button",
    action: "f()"
  },
  { name: "页数：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

'〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n📰评论页数：〖' + (Get('f') == 5 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗前' + Get('f') + '页') + ('\n📝评论排序：〖' + (Get('r') == 0 ? '默认' : '自选') + '〗' + R[Get('r')]) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑繁简转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; R1 = ['time','hot']; var list1 = []; for (var c = 1; c <= Get('f'); c++) { var page = c; var url1 = Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-comment/page?pageNo=' + page + '&pageSize=5&cid=' + list.id + '&orderType=' + R1[Get('r')]; var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var option = { "method": "GET", "headers": headers }; var Url = url1 + ',' + JSON.stringify(option); result1 = java.ajax(Url); var pageList = JSON.parse(result1).data.list; list1 = list1.concat(pageList); } var intro2 = ''; var intro3 = ''; for (var i = 0; i < list1.length; i++) { var intro2_1 = String('[' + java.timeFormat(list1[i].createTime*1000) + ']'); var intro2_2 = '⛄' + '【' + list1[i].nickname + '】: '; var intro2_3 = list1[i].content; intro2 = intro2 + '\nㅤ\n' + intro2_1 + '\n' + intro2_2 + intro2_3; intro3 = ''; } if(String(Account).length > 0) { let dataId = list.id; var SC = cache.get(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId)) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId)) : ''; var BN = list.title; var Bookname = BN.length >= 60 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29, 44) + "\n" + BN.substring(44, 59) + "\n" + BN.substring(59) : (BN.length >= 45 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29, 44) + "\n" + BN.substring(59) : (BN.length >= 30 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14, 29) + "\n" + BN.substring(29) : (BN.length >= 15 ? BN.substring(0, 14) + "\n" + BN.substring(14) : BN))); if (book.readConfig && book.group > 0 && !SC.includes('y')) { let option = '{"body":{"mhid":' + dataId + '},"headers":' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")) + ',"method": "POST"}'; let url = Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/update,' + option; java.ajax(url); cache.put(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId),'y'); login(Put(JSON.stringify('【收藏提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋\n' + Bookname + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️已添加收藏❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛'))); } if (book.readConfig && book.group < 1 && SC.includes('y')) { let option = '{"headers":{"Content-Type":"application/json"},"method": "GET"}'; let url = Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-collect/cancel?ids=' + dataId + ',' + option; java.ajax(url); cache.put(java.md5Encode16(book.originName + Account + dataId),'n'); login(Put(JSON.stringify('【收藏提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋\n' + Bookname + '\n┋┋' + '\n♣️已取消收藏♣️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛'))); } } book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': list.title, 'author': list.author.replace(/[&|,_×]/g, '/').replace(/\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+(\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\/+/g, '/'), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + '\n' + list.summary + changeLog+ '☕【评论】' + intro2, 'cover': Get('url') + list.coverPic, 'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-episodes/list?mhid=' + list.id, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('cache_api_' + Get('url'))); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = cache.get(java.md5Encode16('User' + Get('url'))) == 'y' ? JSON.parse(json)['intro1'] : JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var category = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
    if (/mh-collect/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes,
                'intro': '',
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].mhid
            });
        }
    } else {
        var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
        for (i in list) {
            var kinds = [];
            var kindElements = list[i].cateids ? list[i].cateids.split(',') : [];
            for (var j in kindElements) {
                kinds.push(String(category[kindElements[j]-1].label));
            }
            kind1 = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
            var kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].readnum) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].reader) + ',' + kind1;
            data.push({
                'name': list[i].title,
                'author': list[i].author.replace(/[&|,_×]/g, '/').replace(/\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+(\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\/+/g, '/'),
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': list[i].episodes + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].updateTime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
                'intro': list[i].summary,
                'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
                'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].id
            });
        }
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

if (User == true) {
    var list = JSON.parse(result).data.list;
    var category = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/system/dict-data/list?dictType=vv_mh_category')).data;
    for (i in list) {
        var kinds = [];
        var kindElements = list[i].cateids ? list[i].cateids.split(',') : [];
        for (var j in kindElements) {
            kinds.push(String(category[kindElements[j]-1].label));
        }
        kind1 = kinds.join(',').replace(/\s/g, '');
        var kind = '✦ ' + Num(list[i].readnum) + ',' + '♥ ' + Num(list[i].reader) + ',' + kind1;
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].title,
            'author': list[i].author.replace(/[&|,_×]/g, '/').replace(/\sx\s/g, '/').replace(/(\W)\s+(\W)/g, '$1/$2').replace(/\s\//g, '/').replace(/\/\s/g, '/').replace(/（/g, '(').replace(/）/g, ')').replace(/\/+/g, '/'),
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': list[i].episodes + '〔' + String(java.timeFormat(list[i].updateTime*1000)).replace(/\//g, '-') + '〕',
            'intro': list[i].summary,
            'cover': Get('url') + list[i].coverPic,
            'url': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/get?id=' + list[i].id
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/pageNo=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'pageNo=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    var searchkey = java.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.list[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {

        title = list[i].title;
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({

            'link': Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-episodes/get?jiNo=' + list[i].jiNo + '&mhid=' + list[i].mhid + '&id=' + list[i].id,

} else {

}
Put(data);

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/prod-api/app-api/vv/mh-list/page?pageNo={{page}}&pageSize=100&word=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '');
}(key));
</js>
